title: What Citizens United Did Not Predict and Why It’s Time To Reconsider
dc:creator: Matilde Bombardini
description:
Citizens United v. FEC stands in the public eye as the U.S. Supreme Court case that flooded U.S. elections with “dark money” and SuperPACs. Professor Matilde Bombardini argues that this contemporary reality of campaign finance deviates drastically from the principles underlying the Supreme Court’s now-infamous opinion and that, as such, it is time to reconsider […]

The post What Citizens United Did Not Predict and Why It’s Time To Reconsider appeared first on ProMarket.
